trans-unit.source: FlexEnv extends the environment variables by allowing ingestion of configuration files and (in future) other data sources, and provides a unified environment variable interface identical to os.environ.
trans-unit.target: FlexEnv通过允许吸收配置文件和（将来）其他数据源来扩展环境变量，并提供与 os.environ 相同的统一环境变量接口。

trans-unit.source: an environ-compatible tool for reading config as envvars
trans-unit.target: 一个环境兼容的工具,用于读取config的envars。
